navel.name: Navel Orange
navel.desc: Sweet, seedless and easy-to-peel — famous for its signature belly-button.
navel.full: Navel oranges are one of the world’s most popular sweet oranges, easily recognised by the small belly-button-like navel at one end. Naturally seedless and very easy to peel, they offer a bright sweet flavour with a gentle tang. Ideal for snacking, salads and fresh eating, they are enjoyed globally during their winter season.

valencia.name: Valencia Orange
valencia.desc: High-juice, bright and refreshing — the world’s favourite juicing orange.
valencia.full: Valencia oranges are prized for their exceptional juice content and refreshing sweet-acidic balance. With thin skin and only a few seeds, they are the leading choice for juice production worldwide. Their bright flavour and versatility make them perfect for fresh juice, marmalades, cooking and eating fresh.

midknight.name: Midknight Valencia
midknight.desc: Premium seedless Valencia type — extremely juicy and smooth.
midknight.full: Midknight Valencias are a South African premium strain of Valencia oranges, known for being virtually seedless, exceptionally juicy and smoother in texture compared to standard Valencias. They have thin skin, high juice recovery and a beautifully balanced flavour — making them a top-tier export and juicing favourite.

caracara.name: Cara Cara
caracara.desc: Pink-fleshed, sweet and low-acid — a unique Navel mutation.
caracara.full: Cara Cara oranges are a natural mutation of the Navel orange, recognised by their beautiful rosy-pink flesh. They are seedless, low in acid, and exceptionally sweet, offering subtle berry-like notes. Loved for their colour and flavour, they are ideal for salads, fresh eating and premium juices.

bloodorange.name: Blood Orange
bloodorange.desc: Deep red flesh with raspberry-like notes — bold and dramatic.
bloodorange.full: Blood oranges are known for their striking red flesh, caused by natural anthocyanins. Their flavour is uniquely complex — sweet citrus with raspberry-like tones. They vary from lightly blushed to fully crimson inside. Perfect for juices, cocktails, pastries and fresh eating where visual impact is desired.

clementine.name: Clementine
clementine.desc: Small, seedless, sweet mandarin — easy to peel and loved by all.
clementine.full: Clementines are smooth-skinned, small mandarins known for their rich sweetness, ease of peeling and typically seedless nature. Their tender segments and bright aroma make them a global favourite for children and adults alike. They are perfect for snacking and fresh consumption.

tangerine.name: Tangerine
tangerine.desc: Bright, tangy mandarin with bold aroma and soft peel.
tangerine.full: Tangerines are vibrant mandarins with a deep orange peel, soft texture and a bold, tangy-sweet flavour. Their segments are tender and aromatic, making them beloved for both fresh eating and juicing. Slightly more acidic than clementines, they offer a refreshing citrus bite.
